# init(range:affinity:granularity:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new text selection with the range, selection affinity, and granularity you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(range: NSTextRange, affinity: NSTextSelection.Affinity, granularity: NSTextSelection.Granularity)
```

## Parameters

- **range**: The range of the selection.
- **affinity**: One of the available [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSTextSelection/Affinity-swift.enum] options.
- **granularity**: One of the available [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSTextSelection/Granularity-swift.enum] options.

## Creating a text selection

- **init(_:affinity:)**: Creates a new text selection with the location and selection affinity you provide.
- **init(_:affinity:granularity:)**: Creates a new text selection with the ranges, selection affinity, and granularity you provide.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates a test selection from data in an unarchiver.
